title: MyRecipes - TFG
description: App to manage and plan personalised recipes created with Flutter, Spring Boot and Supabase. Features include recipe creation, meal planning, ingredient management, and user authentication.

title: JPMultitarea
description: Landing page for a company that offers multiple services, built with React and Tailwind. Responsive design with modern animations and contact forms.

title: Gangazon Fichajes
description: Mobile app to manage time and attendance of employees. Users are able to manage their vacations, work hours, upload documents and more. Built with Flutter and Supabase.

title: Valencia Outdoor
description: Multiplatform app for management of an outdoor advertising company. Built with Flutter and Supabase with real-time updates and automated reporting creation.
